description.narrative: The Project will increase access to finance to the underserved population in Guatemala, at least 70 percent of whom would be women. This project intends to contribute to the goal of Universal financial access 2020 ("UFA") of the World Bank Group with operations extended by Génesis Empresarial Foundation to increase its outreach to underserved and vulnerable. The project prioritize access to financing for women, indigenous and rural populations in Guatemala, through market-wide adoption of impact business models, capacity building and enhanced market participation, promoting economic and social sustainable development.

mailing-address.narrative: Fundación Génesis Empresarial Rosario Sarmiento CFO (502) 2388 1046 rsarmiento@genesisempresarial.com 13 Calle 5-51, Guatemala http://www.genesisempresarial.org/
